block.title: A - E
block.description: The letters A - E only use the top 4 dots in each cell.

letter.letter_desc: The letter A has dot 1 only, because A is the first letter of the alphabet.
The letter B has dots 1 and 2, for the second letter of the alphabet.
The letter C has dots 1 and 4.
The letter D has dots 1, 4, and 5.
The letter E has dots 1 and 5.

block.title: F - J
block.description: The letters F - J only use the top 4 dots in each cell.

letter.letter_desc: The letter F has dots 1, 2, 4.
The letter G has dots 1, 2, 4, and 5 - all 4 top dots are full.
The letter H has dots 1, 2, 5. You can think H as taking away dot 4 from letter G.
The letter I has dots 2 and 4. The letters I does not have dot 1.
The letter J has dots 2, 4, and 5. the letters J does not have dot 1.

block.title: K - O
block.description: The letters K - O are formed by repeating the same dots as A - E, then adding dot 3 to each cell.

letter.letter_desc: The letter K has dots 1 and 3. It repeats the same dots as A, then adds dot 3.
The letter L has dots 1, 2, and 3. It repeats the same dots as B, then adds dot 3.
The letter B has dots 1, 3, and 4. It repeats the same dots as C, then adds dot 3.
The letter B has dots 1, 3, 4, and 5. It repeats the same dots as D, then adds dot 3.
The letter B has dots 1, 3, and 5. It repeats the same dots as E, then adds dot 3.

block.title: P - T
block.description: The letters P - T are formed by repeating the same dots as F - J, then adding dot 3 to each cell.

letter.letter_desc: The letter P has dots 1, 2, 3, and 4. It repeats the same dots as F, then adds dot 3.
The letter Q has dots 1, 2, 3, 4, and 5. It repeats the same dots as G, then adds dot 3.
The letter R has dots 1, 2, 3, and 5. It repeats the same dots as H, then adds dot 3.
The letter S has dots 2, 3, and 4. It repeats the same dots as I, then adds dot 3.
The letter T has dots 2, 3, 4, and 5. It repeats the same dots as J, then adds dot 3.

block.title: U - Z
block.description: The letters U - Z, except W are formed by repeating the same dots as K - O, then adding dot 6 to each cell.

letter.letter_desc: The letter U has dots 1, 3, and 6. It repeats the same dots as K, then adds dot 6.
The letter V has dots 1, 2, 3, and 6. It repeats the same dots as L, then adds dot 6.
The letter X has dots 1, 3, 4, and 6. It repeats the same dots as M, then adds dot 6.
The letter Y has dots 1, 3, 4, 5, and 6. It repeats the same dots as N, then adds dot 6.
The letter Z has dots 1, 3, 5, and 6. It repeats the same dots as O, then adds dot 6.

block.title: W
block.description: The letters W is the only letter that does not fit the pattern.

letter.letter_desc: The letter W has dot 2 on the left side, and dots 4, 5, and 6 on the right side.
